document.query: CREATE TABLE `product_review` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` bigint(20), `client_id` bigint(20), `deleted` tinyint(1), `is_approve` tinyint(1), `rating` tinyint(1), `msg` text, `approved_ts` datetime, `created_ts` datetime, `updated_ts` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
